page.title: 06Our Middle School.
page.content: Third Year Questionnaire,Likes & Dislikes.From their replies we found out that their most favourite lessons were English and PE and their worst lesson was Maths.The length of their lessons are 1hr 10mins for a double lesson and 35mins for a single one.They start school at 8.50am and finish at 3.40pm.They have 3 breaks morning(15mins),lunch(1hr 15mins)and afternoon(15mins).The most frequent lesson is Maths.Most of them don't mind wearing the school uniform as they think it is sensible.They all enjoy school and they also like the teachers.They get some homework but not very much.They would like their school to have more facilities like a trampoline,a swimming pool,tennis courts ,a tuck shop and a drinks machine.
